name: Utari-Room
description: Final Year Project - UTARi. An improvement of previous project called Room

name: P-YNPM
description: An organization that contains all of the NPM packages I wrote to solve my own problem

name: AndroidSimpleAIChess
description: First Android Project - Parallel AI Chess Game. Choose against AI from Level 1 to Level 10. You can play against your friend as well.

name: Connect4
description: A Connect-4 Game written in C# WinForms. This program was written to familiarize myself with C# syntax since C# is very similar to Java.

name: LibGDX-Chess-Game
description: A Parallel AI Chess Game made with LibGDX Framework to make the game playable on many devices. Choose against AI from Level 1 to Level 10. You can play against your friend as well.

name: MinimalTicTacToe
description: A Simple AI TicTacToe made with React + TypeScript and Styled-Components for fun. Choose against AI or human. You can play in 3x3 grid up to 5x5. game for fun.

name: RealTimeMarkdown
description: First React Project - A Markdown Editor made with React + TypeScript

name: Room
description: A website build with rental information by web scraping from UTAR Accommodation list and build a better website using the information through collaboration with Eugene Yong
